titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation prohibiting interloping and disorderly trading to New England in America

titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,
